tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE IoT_Triggered_Actions (
  event_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  event_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  trigger_action VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  device_id INT NOT NULL,
  executed_at TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE TriggerEvents (
  trigger_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  event_type VARCHAR(100),
  action_type VARCHAR(100),
  device_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (device_id) REFERENCES IoTDevices(device_id)
);

CREATE TABLE TriggerActions (
    action_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    action_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    action_description TEXT,
    device_id UUID REFERENCES IoTDevices(device_id),
    event_id INT REFERENCES TriggerEvents(event_id)
);

CREATE TABLE TriggerLogs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    trigger_id INT,
    action_id INT,
    log_timestamp TIMESTAMP,

    FOREIGN KEY (trigger_id) REFERENCES TriggerEvents(trigger_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (action_id) REFERENCES TriggerActions(action_id)
);

CREATE TABLE logs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    event_id INT,
    action_id INT,
    log_time TIMESTAMP,
    log_description TEXT
);
